name: TeachThinkReflect
0:
”Alexa, open Teach Think Reflect”
”Alexa, start Teach Think Reflect”
”Alexa, ask Teach Think Reflect for a fact”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: teach think reflect
des: Teach, Think, Reflect provides a quick way for teachers to integrate reflection into their busy day. Reflection is an important part of a teacher's day yet many don't have the time. Teach, Think, Reflect will help you reflect on your day. Say "Alexa, open Teach, Think, Reflect" and Alexa will provide you with two reflection stems. Try this out while you are packing up to go home. Each question or thought statement will start your self-reflection process. When using the skill, you can say "Alexa, next" to move to the next reflection. At any point, you can say "Alexa, stop" to exit the skill.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
